title: Lost id card
content: A friend of mine lost her id card, she's really stressed rn, is there anything she can do, warden wants the tag by evening

comments.body:
There is an online website where you can file a lost and found report and obtain an FIR. I don't remember the name but I'm sure you can find it. 

Once you obtain the FIR, you have to pay the university and obtain a new ID card. The fee is around 500 rupees as far as I know
